overview: Martin Query has more than two decades of executive experience in the US technology sector, and five years of sales management experience in the enterprise data quality software market. Prior to joining Zoomix, he served as Vice President, North American Sales and Marketing for Informatica’s DQ Division (formerly Similarity Systems), and prior to that as Senior Director, World Wide Sales and Business Development, for DataFlux. Earlier sales and account management roles included positions at NetGenesis (acquired by SPSS), Oracle, and Xerox Corporation.
